# Dataset

```{r}
wine_completo <- read.mat("wine.mat") 
wine <- wine_completo$X
wine_outliers <- wine_completo$y

colnames(wine) <- c("Alcohol", "Malic_acid", "Ash", "Alcalinity_of_ash", "Magnesium", "Total_phenols", "Flavanoids", "Nonflavanoid_phenols", "Proanthocyanins", "Color_intensity", "Hue", "OD280/OD315_of_diluted_wines", "Proline")
```
